title: الحكم لم يشرح قرارات الـVAR.. هل خالف كاف لوائح فيفا في افتتاحية كأس أمم أفريقيا؟
summary: أثار الحكم الكونغولي جان جاك ندالا، الجدل الواسع في افتتاحية منافسات كأس أمم أفريقيا 2025 بين المغرب وجزر القمر، بعد أن احتسب ركلة جزاء وألغى أخرى خلال أول 45 دقيقة فقط.

title: James Ransone, Who Played Ziggy Sobotka on ‘The Wire,’ Dies at 46
summary: James Ransone, the actor known for playing Ziggy Sobotka in “The Wire” and Eddie Kaspbrak in “It: Chapter Two,” died by hanging on Friday, according to the Los Angeles County Medical Examiner. He was 46. Ransone appeared as the dock worker-turned-petty criminal, Chester “Ziggy” Sabotka, in 12 episo…

title: انسحاب ومران وحيد مع مدرب جديد.. كيف استعدت زيمبابوي لمواجهة منتخب مصر؟
summary: خاض منتخب زيمبابوي حصة تدريبية جماعية وحيدة، حتى الآن، قبل لقاء مصر، في افتتاحية كأس أمم أفريقيا 2025.

title: Get a pre-built PC with 32GB of RAM for under $1,000 — this mid-range gaming desktop delivers decent performance for an affordable price during these trying times
summary: The ABS Flux II Aqua Gaming PC is on sale for $999.99, slashing $400 off its regular price. This pre-built comes with an Intel Core i5-14400F, an RTX 5060, a 1TB SSD, and 32GB of RAM.

title: ليس صلاح فقط.. مستقبل غامض ينتظر 10 لاعبين في منتخب مصر بعد أمم أفريقيا (صور)
summary: يبدأ منتخب مصر مشواره في كأس أمم أفريقيا (المغرب 2025)، مساء غدٍ الإثنين، بمواجهة المنتخب الزيمبابوي، في إطار منافسات المجموعة الثانية، والتي تشهد تواجد منتخبي جنوب أفريقيا وأنجولا.

title: حارس جنوب أفريقيا: معسكرنا مر بظروف غريبة.. والجودة الدفاعية ستكون مؤثرة بمشوارنا
summary: أكد رونوين ويليامز حارس مرمى منتخب جنوب أفريقيا، أن معسكر الأولاد مر بظروف غريبة.

title: رسميًا.. حسن مصطفى يفوز برئاسة الاتحاد الدولي لكرة اليد
summary: فاز حسن مصطفى، برئاسة الاتحاد الدولي لكرة اليد، لدورة جديدة 2025-2029.

title: Nintendo Switch 2 to reportedly get smaller capacity game cartridges soon, offering an alternative to costly 64GB cards — Storage crisis might delay production, however
summary: The Switch 2's Game-Key Card controversy has a burning new development, and we might finally have a middleground between expensive 64 GB Game Cards and digital-only releases. Smaller capacity cartridges, such as 16 or 32 GB, are reportedly in production but industry-wide shortages might disrupt the…

title: Massive two-year project recovers 144 previously undumped Sega Genesis game ROMs from the mid-1990s — lost Garfield and Flintstones games among the notable finds
summary: A massive, multi-year project to recover Sega Channel games from the mid 1990s has been a resounding success, with many exclusives saved.

title: بعد عرض ألفيركا البرتغالي.. مصدر يكشف ليلا كورة موقف الأهلي من رحيل كوكا
summary: كشف مصدر من النادي الأهلي موقف أحمد نبيل كوكا، لاعب وسط الفريق الأحمر، والذي تلقى عرضا برتغاليا للانتقال إليه في فترة الانتقالات الشتوية المقبلة.

title: Steam app is now 64-bit only on systems that support it, 32-bit support enters final countdown — 32-bit users will stop receiving updates in 2026
summary: Valve has begun the final phase of its plan to end Steam support for 32-bit versions of Windows, with a December Steam client update that changes how the platform runs on modern systems.

title: You can force FSR 4 Redstone to work on RDNA 3 GPUs with new workaround for Linux systems — solution requires Proton compatibility to work properly
summary: AMD's answer to Nvidia's DLSS 4 seemingly works on older hardware but is currently not officially supported.

title: The USB Power Delivery (PD) Specification — everything you need to know about USB-PD
summary: Learn the secrets of the USB PD specification as we delve into how the specification has changed in over a decade of revisions

title: GTA: Vice City is now playable right in your browser, 2002 title that once demanded Pentium 3 now runs in Chrome — requires upload of an original game file to save progress
summary: DOS Zone launched an online, open-source version of GTA: Vice City, allowing you to play the classic game from practically any browser.

title: LG responds swiftly to user backlash, will allow users to remove Microsoft Copilot link from TVs — clarifies service is not an app, future update will include tile removal option from WebOS
summary: LG has clarified how Microsoft Copilot appears on its webOS smart TVs following recent coverage that described the feature as a non-removable app bundled into the operating system.

title: Grab a new Elegoo 3D printer from just $149, thanks to huge holiday sale — up to 53% savings on FDM and resin machines before Christmas
summary: Elegoo has slashed the prices on its 3D printers for the holidays, with up to 53% off.

title: HP Omen 34c G2 34-inch WQHD 180 Hz gaming monitor review: Delivering style, speed and value
summary: HP brings solid performance and value to the 34-inch ultra-wide segment with the Omen 34c G2. It’s a VA panel with WQHD 3440x1440 resolution, 1500R curve, 180 Hz, Adaptive-Sync, MPRT backlight strobe, HDR400 and wide gamut color.

title: Intel-certified 256 GB DDR5 stick could cut Xeon memory power by 18%, saving millions of dollars — a 32W-per-socket reduction could save millions  per hyperscale data center
summary: SK hynix first to validate 32Gb-based 256GB DDR5 module with Intel: up to 32.4W power savings per server, or millions of dollars per hyperscale data center.

title: Grab this £138 2TB Acer Predator SSD before flash prices soar further — fast Gen 4 speeds make this an essential upgrade for your gaming PC
summary: The 2TB Acer Predator GM7000 is a good all-rounder SSD, and priced at £137.96, this is the most affordable 2TB drive you can buy right now in the UK.

title: Critical motherboard flaw allows game cheats, Riot Games blocks 'Valorant' players that don't update BIOS — security patches pushed live by all major motherboard vendors
summary: Riot Games discovered a vulnerability in several motherboards that potentially allowed cheating DMA devices to run before protections kicked in after boot.

title: Score the Meta Quest 3S at its lowest-ever price before Christmas, now just £229 — save 21% on this standalone VR headset with 128GB of storage
summary: Save £60 on the price of the Meta Quest S3 VR headset, back down to its lowest ever price, with delivery still possible before Christmas.
